title: tau build fails on ppc64le
body:
I can't get `tau` to build on `ppc64le`. The compiler is `gcc@7.3.0` and I've tried on `CentOS 7`, `RHEL 7`, and `Ubuntu 18.04`. I'm using Spack @ develop (commit 958f26073efe340 from 18-March-2020).

```
$> spack install tau%gcc@7.3.0 target=ppc64le
...
==> Error: Failed to install tau due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8' 'install'
14 errors found in build log:
     88     Installing utilities...
     89     ====================================================
```
